category_descriptions.Basmati Rice: This category includes all varieties of Basmati rice, known for its long grain and aroma, regardless of processing (e.g., parboiled, brown).
category_descriptions.Aromatic Long Grain Rice (Non-Basmati): This category covers other fragrant long-grain rice varieties, such as Jasmine and Hom Mali, distinct from Basmati.
category_descriptions.Short and Medium Grain Rice: This category includes rice varieties characterized by their shorter, plumper grain shape, such as Japonica, Calrose, and general short/medium grain types.
category_descriptions.Other Milled Rice: This broad category encompasses all other types of milled rice not covered above, including standard long-grain white rice, parboiled rice (non-Basmati/non-Jasmine), glutinous rice, and other specialty colored rices (e.g., black, red).
